General.Name: Elixinol Wellness Limited
General.Description: Elixinol Wellness Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes hemp derived nutraceuticals, cosmetics, and food products in the Americas, Europe, and Australia. It offers hemp derived cannabidiol and food products, dietary supplements, topicals, and skincare products. The company was formerly known as Elixinol Global Limited and changed its name to Elixinol Wellness Limited in May 2021. Elixinol Wellness Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Sydney, Australia.

2.Name: Glen  Zurcher
